  • Citizens
  • Apps
  • Donate

Our fellowship, accelerator and incubator apps are the product of hundreds of community interviews. In partnership with our government partners, fellows and startup founders figure out how to best serve citizens.

For a list of more civic apps check out CfA Commons.
